title: I am switching back to Chrome or Opera because I cannot find extension such as StayFocusd is for Chrome or Leechblock is for Firefox
body: I overall like the improvements that come with Edge over the IE versions. I almost was going to stay with Edge, but didn't find that important extension that I need. Also, the option to disable Edge would be good in case I want to enable it in the future. Right now, I hate the process that I need to go thru to disable it. Way better if I could disable it as with Windows 7 had with IE.

comments.body: This feedback should actually go under general consumer feedback that is relating to Edge browser product. I am not Edge developer but simply browser user.  Thanks for receiving my feedback and I am hoping success for Edge because I kind of like it, just the lack of extension is right now that is breaking the deal.
